title: Zion National Park: Other Special Uses
body: Other Special Uses       Permits are required for any group/organized activity that includes but is not limited to rendezvous & rallies, charity events, sporting, and training events (e.g. cycling/running). If you are unsure if your event/activity requires a permit, please contact us.  Application Fee for other Special Park Uses: $100.00  Submit application a minimum of three weeks in advance.
